name: contrasty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a photograph is contrasty, there is a very obvious difference between the light areas and the dark areas: I wanted to take more realistic photographs with a smoother, less contrasty look. The sun was out, which created a very contrasty light.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film was shot in contrasty black and white, using a hand-held camera.The picture looks rather contrasty because my camera settings were wrong. She had to make sure that the poster was contrasty enough to look good when viewed in black and white.
